reviews.text: Well maintained & friendly staff & security. MC & MA conducts regular weekly activities for the residents. Quite and nice place. Close to the waterways for a good jog. Facilities are not crowded even during peak hours.
Will definitely come back again. Appointment made at 1pm and no additional waiting time was required.  They get down to work immediately, thank you team

This is a very fine residential area. The pools (lap and recreational), gym, and the pond (yes, with kois) are all well maintained. The layout of units are well planned and are spacious. I felt like I was in a resort come night time because of the breeze near the lap pool.

Wonderful Condominium with nice neighbours. Directly linked to Layar LRT. Very convenient with amenities just across the road with supermarkets, retail shops and Coffeeshop. 5mins walk away to Seletar Mall and new Wet Market/Hawker Centre/Community Club will be ready in the next few months. Fernvale is a nice area. Have been living in Fernvale for the past 19 years.

Beautifully located by the Punggol Reservoir and near the Seletar Mall and with the LRT & Bus stop within short walking distance.It also has it's own amenities like swimming pool, gyms & function halls.The enviroment is quiet and peaceful, nice to live in.

Dated 04/06/2017 (Sunday).
